verbs.description: [V: According] to “ Page Six , ” Vanessa Trump reportedly inherited millions from her late father ’s investment in Rao ’s Speciality Foods , which is famous for its pasta and marinara sauce .

[ARGM-ADV: According to “ Page Six] , ” [ARG0: Vanessa Trump] [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: inherited] [ARG1: millions] [ARG2: from her late father ’s investment in Rao ’s Speciality Foods , which is famous for its pasta and marinara sauce] .

According to “ Page Six , ” Vanessa Trump reportedly inherited millions from her late father ’s investment in [ARG1: Rao ’s Speciality Foods] , [R-ARG1: which] [V: is] [ARG2: famous for its pasta and marinara sauce] .
